name: JP Morgan Chase
description: According to Trump’s May 2016 Federal Election Commission filing, which provides a range of values for each of his stock holdings, he owns anywhere from $500,000 to $1 million worth of shares each in Citigroup, JP Morgan Chase , Wells Fargo, Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs -- in other words, five of the famous “big six” banks.

stories.headline: House committees issue subpoenas to Deutsche Bank, JP Morgan Chase, Citigroup, Bank of America to probe Trump's finances

stories.headline: Trump's Stock Portfolio: Big Oil, Big Banks And More Foreign Connections
